title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
description: CS:GO is a fast, competitive tactical shooter focused on team-based objectives and precise shooting mechanics.

title: Dota 2
description: Dota 2 is a deep and strategic MOBA where two teams of five players battle to destroy the enemy's Ancient.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a competitive MOBA with a large roster of champions, strategic gameplay, and ranked progression.

title: Rocket League
description: Rocket League combines soccer with high-octane car-based gameplay and competitive matches.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is a multiplayer social deduction game where crewmates complete tasks while impostors try to sabotage them.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world RPG set in Night City, featuring narrative-driven missions and deep character customization.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3 is an open-world RPG with a rich story, memorable characters, and expansive quests.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an open-world action game featuring story-driven missions, multiplayer (GTA Online), and an expansive city to explore.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action RPG about Vikings, raiding, and building a settlement in England.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: RDR2 is an open-world western with immersive storytelling, realistic world simulation, and deep character arcs.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a story-rich CRPG built on Dungeons & Dragons rules with turn-based combat and deep roleplay.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG featuring challenging combat, exploration, and deep lore created with George R. R. Martin contribution.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Hollow Knight is an atmospheric Metroidvania with tight platforming, exploration, and beautiful art.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley is a farming simulation with crafting, relationship-building, and exploration of mines and festivals.

title: Portal 2
description: Portal 2 is a single- and cooperative-player puzzle game that challenges players to solve physics-based tests using a portal gun.

title: Hades
description: Hades is a rogue-like dungeon crawler where you battle out of the Underworld as Zagreus, using a cast of powerful gods to upgrade your weapons and abilities.

title: Dead Cells
description: Dead Cells is a roguelike, metroidvania-inspired action-platformer with fast-paced combat and procedurally-generated levels.

title: Celeste
description: Celeste is a precision platformer about climbing a mountain, featuring tight controls, a touching story, and challenging levels.

title: Terraria
description: Terraria is an action-adventure sandbox game with exploration, building, crafting, combat, and mining.
